DOC.brief_summary: Exercise consultation, an intervention approach based on the transtheoretical model has been successful in promoting physical activity (PA) among adults. It is unknown whether this approach would be efficacious with youth. The purpose of this pilot study was to assess whether exercise consultation would increase PA levels and improve anthropometric measures and metabolic markers in obese adolescents.
DOC.criteria: Adolescents BMI greater than or equal to the 95th percentile for age (2000 CDC growth charts) Pregnancy Underlying medical condition, physical or cognitive disability that will impair individual`s ability to participate in physical activity
